WIG.description: A set of strategic priorities allows an organization to focus energy and resources around the projects that create the greatest impact. See https://avvojira.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AAV/pages/127729777/WIGs+and+sWIGs

sWIG.description: Small chunks to get the Wildly Important Goal done

DUHB.description: The model for which we make decisions. Start with the data, and use that to lead into hypothesis

CTA.description: Usually a button - Something we want the user to physically do on a page

Banana Stand.description: Sales tool for querying inventory, managing customers, and building quotes

MPR.description: Predicts our monthly revenue from ads

Remnant Ads.description: Ad slots that can be sold when existing ad value is met

TPS.description: Uses analytics to intelligently generate pricing

APL.description: Win-back product to replace free AvvoPro

yatlab.definition: Yet Another Three Letter Acronym bot
